price: هغه وویل: زه غوره يم له هغه څخه، زه دې له اوره پيدا كړى يم او هغه دى له خټې پيدا كړی.
arabic: قَالَ أَنَا۠ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهُ خَلَقۡتَنِي مِن نَّارٖ وَخَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن طِينٖ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: qāla anā khayrun min'hu khalaqtanī min nārin wakhalaqtahu min ṭīnin
